title: Head-to-Head-to-Head PPR Mock Draft Episode! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 7/16
description:
On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s mock draft time! Three different draft approaches from Andy, Mike, and Jason -- see how it all plays out! Plus, specific tips for the later rounds, when drafting backup running backs. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for July 16th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit and Draft Analyzer are available NOW

Full Draft Results
